A broken staff is an item that can be repaired into different kinds of staves at a repair bench or higher in the Workshop of a player-owned house. Repairing one gives 15 Crafting experience.

Broken staves can be dug up at the Digsite, or fished up on the Fishing Trawler.

When shown to the archaeological expert, he says, "Look at this... Interesting.,. This appears to belong to a cleric of some kind; certainly not a follower of Saradomin. However, I wonder if there was another civilisation here before the Saradominists."

Contents

  • 1 Repairing probabilities
  • 2 Item sources
  • 3 Profit analysis
  • 4 References

Repairing probabilities[edit | edit source]

Rates from Mod Ash.[1]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Staff157/100359
Magic staff126/100121120
Staff of water15/1001,093900
Staff of air14/1001,451900
Staff of earth14/100809900
Staff of fire14/1001,243900

Item sources[edit | edit source]

For an exhaustive list of all known sources for this item, see here (include RDT).
SourceLevelQuantityRarity
Fishing TrawlerN/A UnknownVaries
Soil Level 2 digs 126/450
Soil Level 3 digs 120/300

Profit analysis[edit | edit source]

Considering the Grand Exchange values and probabilities of obtaining each staff, repairing a Broken staff will on average yield 246. Thus repairing broken staves is hardly worth it even in bulk.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 13 February 2019. (Archived from the original on 27 May 2020.) Mod Ash: "5% staff of water 4% staff of fire 4% staff of air 4% staff of earth 26% "magic staff" 57% basic staff"
